briefTitle: Voriconazole Versus Itraconazole In Primary Prophylaxis Of Invasive Fungal Infection (IFI) In Subjects With Allogeneic Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplants (HSCT)
officialTitle: Prospective, Open-Label, Comparative, Multi-Center Study Of Voriconazole Compared To Itraconazole For The Primary Prophylaxis Of Invasive Fungal Infection (IFI) With Allogeneic Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplants (HSCT)
conditions: Antifungal Prophylaxis of Invasive Fungal Infections
summary: Study is to compare antifungal prophylaxis of Voriconazole and Itraconazole in subjects who have had a Stem Cell Transplant. The success of the end point will be measured using evidence of Infection, drug compliance and survival.

primaryOutcome.measure: Success at Day 180: Percent of Responders (Randomization Strata)
